name: XeroDunes
description:
This one was fully created by "GamerKing64". After a long time spent learning the structure of KDE Plasma this rice was born. We are very proud of him for graduating to full-time ricer status.

it's very light on resources, your machine will fly ! We have opted to use the Dracula Theme this time around, as it looks so clean and is easy on the eyes. We hope you like it... ðŸ˜‰"

name: XeroLayan
description:
This rice was the main one used on Xero for a while, uses Latte for both Panels & Dock. It is intended to be mainly used on XeroLinux. NOT intended for low-end systems !

Test it out and let me know...

name: XeroNord
description: This is a Nordic themed rice. Uses the Nord theme with Latte-Dock for panels as well as Dock. Separated into multiple zones. Even Konsole is themed and Grub. Follow steps below. NOT intended for low-end systems !

name: XeroSweet
description: This rice is super simple, based on the SweetKDE theme with Candy Icons, not very Busy. It is intended to be mainly used on XeroLinux. Have fun. NOT intended for low-end systems !
